items.definition: To become gradually damaged, worse, or less; to cause something to do this
To see, recognize, or understand something that is not clear
To come or bring something back to life, health, existence, or use
To watch carefully the way something happens or the way someone does something, especially in order to learn more about it
A large, open area of land, water, or sky
If things such as paper or leaves rustle, or if you rustle them, they move about and make a soft, dry sound
